    January 15, 2014

  • How I'm Handling Responsive Images With Jekyll

    December 05, 2013

For me, that means using the picturefill.js polyfill combined with a Jekyll/liquid hack. I know there's got to be a better way, but since I'm not sure what that is just yet, I'll do this.
